actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to add 522 miles to the Interstate System and provide for the inclusion of a critical north-south highway corridor.

summary.text: Authorizes an additional 522 miles for the Interstate System. Makes this mileage available only for designation as an Interstate System traffic corridor along United States route 219 between Buffalo, New York and Princeton, West Virginia. Authorizes to be appropriated out of the Highway Trust Fund $870,000,000 to carry out this Act. (Amends 23 U.S.C. 103(e))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to add 522 miles to the Interstate System and provide for the inclusion of a critical north-south highway corridor.
